entry.value: SELECT SOURCE_DIRECTORY srcDir, PROCESSED_DIRECTORY procDir,UNPROCSSED_DIRECTORY unProcDir,ACK_DIRECTORY ackDir,WORKING_DIRECTORY workingDir FROM TPMS.T_FIELD_MAPPING WHERE FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE AND AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_FORMAT =:FILE_FORMAT

SELECT FIELD_TYPE, FIELD_NAME, START_POSITION, END_POSITION, VALIDATION_TYPE, VALIDATION_VALUE, FIELD_INDEX_POSITION, IS_POJO_VALUE, FILE_LEVEL_REJECTION FROM T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL INNER JOIN T_FIELD_MAPPING T_FIELD_MAPPING ON T_FIELD_MAPPING_DETAIL.FIELD_MAPPING_PK_ID=T_FIELD_MAPPING.ID WHERE AGENCY_ID =:AGENCY_ID AND FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE ORDER BY FIELD_INDEX_POSITION
SELECT COUNT(FILE_NAME) FROM TPMS.T_LANE_TX_CHECKPOINT WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME AND XFER_XMIT_STATUS =:XFER_XMIT_STATUS
SELECT PLAZA_ID,EXTERN_PLAZA_ID,AGENCY_ID,LPR_ENABLED FROM MASTER.T_PLAZA order by plaza_id
select LANE_ID,EXTERN_LANE_ID,PLAZA_ID,LPR_ENABLED from MASTER.T_LANE
SELECT COUNT(XFER_FILE_NAME) FROM MASTER.T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_FILE_NAME=:XFER_FILE_NAME
SELECT AGENCY_ID FROM CRM.T_AGENCY WHERE FILE_PREFIX=:FILE_PREFIX

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT (FILE_NAME,PROCESS_DATE,FILE_STATUS_IND,LAST_LANE_TX_ID,LAST_TX_TIMESTAMP,LAST_EXTERN_LANE_ID,LAST_EXTERN_PLAZA_ID,RECORD_COUNT) VALUES (:FILE_NAME,:PROCESS_DATE,:FILE_STATUS_IND,:LAST_LANE_TX_ID,:LAST_TX_TIMESTAMP,:LAST_EXTERN_LANE_ID,:LAST_EXTERN_PLAZA_ID,:RECORD_COUNT)

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_IA_ACK_STATUS (ACK_FILE_NAME,ACK_FILE_DATE,ACK_FILE_TIME,ACK_FILE_STATUS,TRX_FILE_NAME,RECON_FILE_NAME,FILE_TYPE,FROM_AGENCY,TO_AGENCY,EXTERN_FILE_ID,ATP_FILE_ID) VALUES (:ACK_FILE_NAME,:ACK_FILE_DATE,:ACK_FILE_TIME,:ACK_FILE_STATUS,:TRX_FILE_NAME,:RECON_FILE_NAME,:ACK_FILE_TYPE,:FROM_AGENCY,:TO_AGENCY,:EXTERN_FILE_ID,:ATP_FILE_ID)
SELECT AGENCY_ID, AGENCY_NAME,DEVICE_PREFIX, IS_HOME_AGENCY FROM CRM.T_AGENCY

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_TRAN_DETAIL (LANE_TX_ID, TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, TX_TYPE, TX_SUB_TYPE,TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, ENTRY_LANE_ID,PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, PLAZA_ID, LANE_ID, TX_DATE, TX_TIMESTAMP, LANE_MODE,DEVICE_NO, ACTUAL_CLASS, ACTUAL_AXLES,PLATE_STATE, PLATE_NUMBER, PLATE_COUNTRY, READ_PERF, WRITE_PERF, VEHICLE_SPEED, SPEED_VIOLATION,DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, RECEIVED_DATE, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCT_AGENCY_ID, ETC_ACCOUNT_ID, ETC_SUBACCOUNT, UPDATE_TS,DEBIT_CREDIT,ETC_VALID_STATUS,DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,AET_FLAG,EXT_FILE_ID,EXPECTED_REVENUE_AMOUNT,POSTED_FARE_AMOUNT,ETC_FARE_AMOUNT,CASH_FARE_AMOUNT,TX_STATUS,TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE,PROG_STAT,TOLL_AMOUNT) values (:LANE_TX_ID, :TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, :TX_TYPE, :TX_SUB_TYPE,:TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, :ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, :ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, :ENTRY_LANE_ID,:PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, :PLAZA_ID, :LANE_ID, :TX_DATE, :TX_TIMESTAMP, :LANE_MODE,:DEVICE_NO, :ACTUAL_CLASS, :ACTUAL_AXLES, :PLATE_STATE, :PLATE_NUMBER, :PLATE_COUNTRY, :READ_PERF, :WRITE_PERF, :VEHICLE_SPEED, :SPEED_VIOLATION,:DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, :UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, :RECEIVED_DATE, :ACCOUNT_TYPE, :ACCT_AGENCY_ID,:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,:ETC_SUBACCOUNT,:UPDATE_TS,:DEBIT_CREDIT,:ETC_VALID_STATUS,:DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,:VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,:AET_FLAG,:EXT_FILE_ID, :EXPECTED_REVENUE_AMOUNT, :POSTED_FARE_AMOUNT, :ETC_FARE_AMOUNT, :CASH_FARE_AMOUNT, :TX_STATUS,:TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE,:PROG_STAT,:TOLL_AMOUNT)

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_TRAN_DETAIL (LANE_TX_ID, TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, TX_TYPE, TX_SUB_TYPE, TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, ENTRY_LANE_ID, ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, PLAZA_ID, LANE_ID, TX_DATE, TX_TIMESTAMP, LANE_MODE, LANE_STATE, TRX_LANE_SERIAL, DEVICE_NO, AVC_CLASS, TAG_IAG_CLASS, TAG_CLASS, TAG_AXLES, ACTUAL_CLASS, ACTUAL_AXLES, EXTRA_AXLES, PLATE_STATE, PLATE_NUMBER, PLATE_TYPE, PLATE_COUNTRY, READ_PERF, WRITE_PERF, PROG_STAT, COLLECTOR_NUMBER, IMAGE_CAPTURED, VEHICLE_SPEED, SPEED_VIOLATION, RECIPROCITY_TRX, IS_VIOLATION,FULL_FARE_AMOUNT, DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, EXT_FILE_ID, RECEIVED_DATE, ACCOUNT_TYPE, ACCT_AGENCY_ID, ETC_ACCOUNT_ID, ETC_SUBACCOUNT, DST_FLAG, IS_PEAK,FARE_TYPE,UPDATE_TS,LANE_DATA_SOURCE,LANE_TYPE,LANE_HEALTH,AVC_AXLES,TOUR_SEGMENT_ID,BUF_READ,READER_ID,TOLL_AMOUNT,DEBIT_CREDIT,ETC_VALID_STATUS,DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,PLAN_TYPE,RESERVED,ATP_FILE_ID,AET_FLAG,MATCHED_TX_EXTERN_REF_NO ) values (:LANE_TX_ID, :TX_EXTERN_REF_NO, :TX_TYPE, :TX_SUB_TYPE, :TOLL_SYSTEM_TYPE, :TOLL_REVENUE_TYPE, :ENTRY_TX_TIMESTAMP, :ENTRY_PLAZA_ID, :ENTRY_LANE_ID, :ENTRY_TX_SEQ_NUMBER, :ENTRY_DATA_SOURCE, :ENTRY_VEHICLE_SPEED, :PLAZA_AGENCY_ID, :PLAZA_ID, :LANE_ID, :TX_DATE, :TX_TIMESTAMP, :LANE_MODE, :LANE_STATE, :TRX_LANE_SERIAL, :DEVICE_NO, :AVC_CLASS, :TAG_IAG_CLASS, :TAG_CLASS, :TAG_AXLES, :ACTUAL_CLASS, :ACTUAL_AXLES, :EXTRA_AXLES, :PLATE_STATE, :PLATE_NUMBER, :PLATE_TYPE, :PLATE_COUNTRY, :READ_PERF, :WRITE_PERF, :PROG_STAT, :COLLECTOR_NUMBER, :IMAGE_CAPTURED, :VEHICLE_SPEED, :SPEED_VIOLATION, :RECIPROCITY_TRX, :IS_VIOLATION,:FULL_FARE_AMOUNT, :DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT, :UNREALIZED_AMOUNT, :EXT_FILE_ID, :RECEIVED_DATE, :ACCOUNT_TYPE, :ACCT_AGENCY_ID,:ETC_ACCOUNT_ID,:ETC_SUBACCOUNT,:DST_FLAG,:IS_PEAK,:FARE_TYPE,:UPDATE_TS,:LANE_DATA_SOURCE,:LANE_TYPE,:LANE_HEALTH,:AVC_AXLES,:TOUR_SEGMENT_ID,:BUF_READ,:READER_ID,:TOLL_AMOUNT,:DEBIT_CREDIT,:ETC_VALID_STATUS,:DISCOUNTED_AMOUNT_2,:VIDEO_FARE_AMOUNT,:PLAN_TYPE,:RESERVED,:ATP_FILE_ID,:AET_FLAG,:MATCHED_TX_EXTERN_REF_NO)
SELECT * FROM TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME

UPDATE TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT SET RECORD_COUNT=:RECORD_COUNT,FILE_STATUS_IND=:FILE_STATUS_IND,LAST_LANE_TX_ID=:LAST_LANE_TX_ID,LAST_TX_TIMESTAMP=:LAST_TX_TIMESTAMP,LAST_EXTERN_LANE_ID=:LAST_EXTERN_LANE_ID,LAST_EXTERN_PLAZA_ID=:LAST_EXTERN_PLAZA_ID,FILE_SEQ_NUM=:ATRN_FILE_NUM,FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE,XFER_CONTROL_ID=:XFER_CONTROL_ID WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME
SELECT XFER_FILE_NAME,XFER_CONTROL_ID FROM MASTER.T_XFER_CONTROL WHERE XFER_FILE_NAME=:XFER_FILE_NAME
SELECT SEQ_ATP_FILE_ID.NEXTVAL AS NEXTSEQ FROM DUAL

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_QATP_STATISTICS (ATP_FILE_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_NAME, INSERT_DATE,INSERT_TIME,RECORD_COUNT,AMOUNT ,IS_PROCESSED,PROCESS_DATE,PROCESS_TIME,PROCESS_REC_COUNT,UPDATE_TS,XFER_CONTROL_ID) values (:ATP_FILE_ID, :FILE_TYPE, :FILE_NAME, :INSERT_DATE,:INSERT_TIME,:RECORD_COUNT,:AMOUNT,:IS_PROCESSED,:PROCESS_DATE,:PROCESS_TIME,:PROCESS_REC_COUNT,:UPDATE_TS,:XFER_CONTROL_ID)
SELECT * FROM TPMS.T_QATP_STATISTICS WHERE FILE_NAME=:FILE_NAME

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_FO_FILE_STATS (FILE_CONTROL_ID,TRX_FILE_NAME,DISTRIB_FILE_NAME,PROCESSED_FLAG,INPUT_COUNT,OUTPUT_COUNT,FROM_AGENCY,TO_AGENCY,FILE_DATE,FILE_SEQ_NUM,FILE_TYPE,UPDATE_TS) values (:FILE_CONTROL_ID,:TRX_FILE_NAME,:DISTRIB_FILE_NAME,:PROCESSED_FLAG,:INPUT_COUNT,:OUTPUT_COUNT,:FROM_AGENCY,:TO_AGENCY,:FILE_DATE,:FILE_SEQ_NUM,:FILE_TYPE,:UPDATE_TS)
SELECT * FROM TPMS.T_FO_FILE_STATS WHERE TRX_FILE_NAME=:TRX_FILE_NAME
SELECT * FROM TPMS.T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS WHERE TRX_EPS_FILENAME=:TRX_EPS_FILENAME

INSERT INTO TPMS.T_FO_RECON_FILE_STATS (FILE_CONTROL_ID,TRX_EPS_FILENAME,TRX_EPS_COUNT,TRX_EPS_AMOUNT,PROCESSED_FLAG,EPS_RECON_FILENAME,EPS_RECON_COUNT,RECON_PROCESSED_FLAG,FO_RECON_FILENAME,FROM_AGENCY,TO_AGENCY,FILE_SEQ_NUMBER,UPDATE_TS) values (:FILE_CONTROL_ID,:TRX_EPS_FILENAME,:TRX_EPS_COUNT,:TRX_EPS_AMOUNT,:PROCESSED_FLAG,:EPS_RECON_FILENAME,:EPS_RECON_COUNT,:RECON_PROCESSED_FLAG,:FO_RECON_FILENAME,:FROM_AGENCY,:TO_AGENCY,:FILE_SEQ_NUMBER,:UPDATE_TS)

SELECT master.t_plaza.extern_plaza_id, master.t_lane.extern_lane_id, master.t_lane.lane_id, master.t_lane.plaza_id, master.t_plaza.agency_id FROM master.t_lane FULL OUTER JOIN master.t_plaza ON master.t_lane.plaza_id = master.t_plaza.plaza_id WHERE master.t_plaza.agency_id IN ( SELECT crm.t_agency.agency_id FROM crm.t_agency WHERE is_home_agency = 'N' ) ORDER BY 1 DESC
SELECT AGENCY_ID, AGENCY_NAME, AGENCY_SHORT_NAME, DEVICE_PREFIX, IS_HOME_AGENCY, FILE_PREFIX, PARENT_AGENCY_ID from CRM.t_agency where is_home_agency ='Y'
SELECT * FROM MASTER.T_PROCESS_PARAMETERS where PARAM_NAME = :PARAM_NAME
SELECT count(*) FROM TPMS.T_RECONCILIATION_CHECKPOINT where FILE_STATUS_IND = :PROCESS_STATUS and FILE_TYPE=:FILE_TYPE and FILE_SEQ_NUM =:ATRN_FILE_NUM
